comment: She's nice, just be prepared for the labs by reading the lab worksheets and make sure to understand the material or else you'll be lost. But the material should be "easy". There was a scientific poster she made us present in front of the class at the end of the semester, it was okay. she gave us 2 attempts for lab quizzes which was great.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She is a really good professor. I took her class in the spring semester and it was not hard at all. She is funny and explains all assignments well. She is very helpful in class too. TAKE HER!!!
She is an amazing professor! Take her class! She really cares about her students!!! I definitely enjoyed this class!! Also, she gives great advices and feedback!
She is a great professor who is willing to work with each student to help them understand the material. She make lectures and labs fun and makes sure to help everyone.
She was a very cool teacher that understands her students very well
She was the best professor to take for biology Lab. Makes lab super easy and entertaining. One of the sweetest teachers at Kennesaw, definitely recommend. Can talk to her about anything!!!!!
I loved this class. I wish I could take it again. It was easy to understand except the final wasnt in her hands but definitely prepare for the final. Ill miss this class so much.
